title: Masumi Verified Agent
description: Verifiable credential attesting that an AI agent on the Masumi platform has been verified. Issued after the agent owner completes KYC and proves control of the agent's KERI identifier.

attributes.name: kycVerificationId
attributes.description: ID of the KYC verification record for the user who requested verification

attributes.name: agentName
attributes.description: Display name of the verified agent

attributes.name: agentApiUrl
attributes.description: API URL of the verified agent
